body_html:
I think static graph can be optimized, so it has the advantage of the memory consumption and enables fast calculation.
you can also find the discussion about this in the other framework MXNet.

https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/architecture/note_memory.html

I hope this answer gives the solution about your question

body:
I think static graph can be optimized, so it has the advantage of the memory consumption and enables fast calculation.
you can also find the discussion about this in the other framework MXNet.

https://mxnet.incubator.apache.org/architecture/note_memory.html

I hope this answer gives the solution about your question
